id.title: Id must be present and must be a URI

lngString.title: Language string, must have a language and value must be an array.

class.title: Classes MUST have an id and type property and MAY have a label.

reference.title: Reference
reference.description: Id. type but not items are required

choice.title: Choice
choice.description: must have a type:'Choice' and an items array

then.title: Annotation bodies which are TextualBody MUST have an type and value property.
ContentResource: (not a TextualBody):
then.description: Annotation bodies MUST have an id and type property.

service.title: Service
service.description: must be an array and have an id and type or @id and @type

then.title: ServiceV2
then.description: A version 2 IIIF service needs an @id and @type

allOf.title: ServiceV3
allOf.description: A version 3 IIIF service needs an id and type

rights.title: Rights URI isn't from either Creative Commons or RightsStatements.org. Both require http links.

type.title: Are you validating a collection?
type.description: If you are validating a manifest, you may get this error if there are errors in the manifest. The validator first validates it as a manifest and if that fails it will try and validate it using the other types.

items.title: Collection items
items.description: can only by Manifest references or Collections

allOf.title: Canvas
allOf.description: require items, (height and width) or (duration) or (height, width and duration)

then.title: Annotation target can also contain just scope and source
